Well...

the absolute earliest
would be dawn tomorrow morning.
translation.fr: ce serait demain matin à l'aube.

translation.en: Yes.
It is well.
That is it.
So you like to drug and rape young women?
translation.fr: Vous aimez droguer et violer des femmes ?

translation.en: Excuse me?
I'm the editor of The Scoop.
I know you and I know what you do.
translation.fr: Je vous connais, vous et vos vices.

translation.en: I'm coming for you and your sick friends.
translation.fr: Je vous ferai tomber, vous et vos amis.

translation.en: Prick!
I, Ehi, do swear by the gods...
translation.fr: Moi, Ehi, je jure devant les dieux...

translation.en: ...that if I dare cross my sponsors...
...I will find myself in the coffin...
...and so shall it be.
We have confirmed from our colleagues in the police.
translation.fr: Nos collègues dans la police ont confirmé vos dires.

translation.en: We would... have a task force for dawn tomorrow.
translation.fr: L'unité sera opérationnelle demain matin à l'aube.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, thank you.
Thank you very much. You won't be sorry about this, I promise.
translation.fr: Merci beaucoup. Vous ne le regretterez pas, croyez-moi.

translation.en: I need you to leave, Mr. Okoye.
Yeah.
I suppose I'm not allowed to join you for the operation tomorrow?
translation.fr: Je suppose que je ne peux pas participer à l'opération, demain ?

translation.en: No.
It's an official operation. Definitely not.
translation.fr: C'est une opération officielle. Pas question.

translation.en: Right.
Thank you. Thank you.
Next.
Please, can I read the contract before I sign?
translation.fr: Je peux lire le contrat avant de signer ?

translation.en: Of course.
You have ten seconds to read and sign.
translation.fr: Tu as dix secondes pour lire et signer.

translation.en: - Any problem? - No. Not at all.
translation.fr: - Un problème ? - Non. Pas du tout.

translation.en: Sign.
Auntie, when do we leave?
When it's time to go, we'll go. Next!
translation.fr: Quand ce sera le moment. Suivante !

translation.en: What's up?
What did you get? What passport were you given?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'ils t'ont donné ? Quel passeport t'as eu ?

translation.en: Wachuka Otieno from Kenya.
Mine is Thandie Zwane from South Africa.
translation.fr: Le mien, c'est Thandie Zwane d'Afrique du Sud.

translation.en: How are you?
I want to ask you something.
translation.fr: J'ai un truc à te demander.

translation.en: What is it?
Please let me use your phone.
But I don't have a phone.
- You have a phone. - No, I do not.
I know you have a phone. I saw you with it earlier.
translation.fr: T'en as un. Je t'ai vue avec.

translation.en: No. I don't have one.
I want to call my mom quickly.
translation.fr: Je veux appeler ma mère vite fait.

translation.en: - I didn't know phones weren't allowed. - No. No.
translation.fr: J'ignorais que les portables étaient interdits.

translation.en: I just want her to know Beauty and I are okay.
translation.fr: Je veux juste lui dire qu'on va bien.

translation.en: Please.
But it's not safe.
Look, I won't talk for longer than 30 seconds.
translation.fr: Ça prendra pas plus de 30 secondes.

translation.en: I don't like this.
Please.
Please be very careful.
Trust me. Trust me.
Please.
I will leave it under your pillow tonight.
translation.fr: Je le mettrai sous ton oreiller ce soir.

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you.
Who is calling me so late?
Hello.
Mom, it's me. Please don't get upset. I can't speak for long right now.
translation.fr: Maman, c'est moi. Te fâche pas. Je peux pas parler longtemps.

translation.en: Thank God you called me. What's going on?
translation.fr: Dieu merci, c'est toi. Que se passe-t-il ?

translation.en: My mind is not at peace. How is Beauty? Hope she is fine.
translation.fr: Je suis inquiète. Comment va Beauty ? Bien, j'espère.

translation.en: She's fine. I can't talk much right now.
translation.fr: Elle va bien. Je peux pas beaucoup parler.

translation.en: I'll call you when I can.
translation.fr: Je te rappelle quand je peux.

translation.en: What are you doing? You are very stupid. Give me that phone.
translation.fr: Tu fais quoi ? Donne-moi ce portable.

translation.en: Come on! Get out of here!
Out!
Everyone, wake up and go to the pool! Now!
translation.fr: Tout le monde debout ! Allez au bord de la piscine ! Exécution !

translation.en: If you're still asleep, you'll die anyway.
translation.fr: Si vous dormez encore, vous mourrez quand même.

translation.en: Out! Didn't you hear me? Move!
Run, run, run!
What did I say about phones?
translation.fr: J'avais dit quoi pour les portables ?

translation.en: What did I say?
I said no phones.
I said anyone caught with a phone will be in serious trouble.
translation.fr: J'avais dit qu'on s'occuperait de quiconque en aurait un.

translation.en: Not only does she have a phone, she has been spying on us!
translation.fr: Non seulement elle en a un, mais en plus elle nous espionne !

translation.en: No.
Using it to send information about where we are.
translation.fr: Elle a envoyé des informations sur notre localisation.

translation.en: No! No.
- Linda... - No.
- Linda... - Please. No.
Linda!
- Quiet! - Linda!
Everyone go pack your things and get ready.
translation.fr: Allez faire vos valises et préparez-vous.

translation.en: We are leaving now!
Are you all deaf? Move!
Move!
Why did you have to kill her?
She was sending information to someone. Who was she?
translation.fr: Elle envoyait des infos à quelqu'un.

translation.en: What if she is from the police?
- I don't know. - Wrong answer. It's your job to know.
translation.fr: - Je sais pas. - Mauvaise réponse. Tu dois savoir.

translation.en: - You're supposed to investigate. - I did all my checks.
translation.fr: - T'es censée enquêter. - J'ai fait toutes les vérifs.

translation.en: Well, you didn't do a good job.
translation.fr: T'as pas fait du bon boulot.

translation.en: I swear if this doesn't turn out well, you'll be in big trouble.
translation.fr: Je jure que si ça tourne mal, t'auras de gros ennuis.

translation.en: - Do you know where her family lives? - Of course. I know.
translation.fr: - Tu sais où vit sa famille ? - Bien sûr que oui.

translation.en: We need to send them a message. Let them know who they are playing with.
translation.fr: On doit leur envoyer un message. Qu'ils sachent à qui ils se frottent.

translation.en: - Heli. - Yes, boss.
Please change your clothes.
Please.
- Take those girls. - Okay, boss.
Hey madam, stand up, let's go. Up!
- Stand up! Let's go! - I said stand up and go!
translation.fr: - Debout ! - On se lève et on y va !

translation.en: Move. I said move!
Avoid their faces in case we still need them.
translation.fr: Évite leur visage. On pourrait encore en avoir besoin.

translation.en: What do you know about the phone?
translation.fr: Que savez-vous à propos du portable ?

translation.en: This one's a rural girl. Take her away.
She's an idiot. She doesn't know anything.
translation.fr: C'est une idiote. Elle ne sait rien.

translation.en: This one...
I'm not too sure about this one.
What do you know about the phone?
translation.fr: Que sais-tu à propos du portable ?

translation.en: I don't know anything.
- What do you know about the phone? - Nothing.
translation.fr: - Que sais-tu à propos du portable ? - Rien.

translation.en: - What do you know about the phone? - Nothing.
translation.fr: - Que sais-tu à propos du portable ? - Rien.

translation.en: You don't know anything?
- You don't know anything? - I don't know--
translation.fr: - Tu sais rien ? - Je ne sais...

translation.en: Do you think I am joking?
What do you know about the phone?
translation.fr: Que sais-tu à propos du portable ?

translation.en: Do you think I'm a rookie?
Are you crazy? What do you know about the phone?
translation.fr: T'es folle ? Que sais-tu à propos du portable ?

translation.en: - You want to ruin my business, right? - No.
translation.fr: - T'en as après mon business ? - Non.

translation.en: You want to ruin my business, right?
You don't want to talk?
You don't want to talk, right?
What happened?
Looks like they got away before we got here.
translation.fr: Ils ont filé avant notre arrivée.

translation.en: They must have been tipped off. They left in a hurry.
translation.fr: On a dû les prévenir. Ils sont partis en vitesse.

translation.en: Where would they go now?
Go to the poolside at the back of the house.
There's a body lying there. Check if it's not your reporter.
translation.fr: Il y a un corps. Voyez si c'est pas votre journaliste.

translation.en: Mr. Victor.
An important person.
Mr. Victor.
- How are you? - I'm good. How are things with you?
translation.fr: - Comment ça va ? - Bien. Et vous ?

translation.en: - How are you? - I'm well.
- Hope the business is thriving? - The usual, we keep pushing.
translation.fr: - Les affaires vont bien ? - Ça suit son cours.

translation.en: Miss?
Where are you going?
- I want to pee. - I need to have a shit.
translation.fr: - Je veux aller pisser. - J'ai envie de chier.

translation.en: You're full of shit.
We are about to cross the border and you guys need to go shit!
translation.fr: On va traverser la frontière, et vous voulez aller chier !

translation.en: Alright, move. Move fast!
Fast, no time!
Let go of her hand! Keep going.
This way!
Move!
Where are your papers?
What are you transporting? I want to know what you're taking across the border.
translation.fr: Que transportez-vous de l'autre côté de la frontière ?

translation.en: I said, open your trunk. I want to see if you're carrying anything illegal.
translation.fr: Ouvrez votre coffre. Je veux voir si vous ne transportez rien d'illégal.

translation.en: You're not carrying much. That's what they always say.
translation.fr: Vous transportez pas grand-chose. Ils disent toujours ça.

translation.en: I told you to leave.
translation.fr: Je vous ai dit de partir.

translation.en: I'm a journalist. As a matter of fact, this is a matter of life and death.
translation.fr: Je suis journaliste. C'est une question de vie ou de mort.

translation.en: It is important. My staff is there. I need to be there.
translation.fr: Mon employée est ici. Je dois la retrouver.

translation.en: Please understand my point.
You understand me now. I said shut up, get in the car and leave.
translation.fr: À vous de comprendre. Montez dans la voiture et partez.

translation.en: Help! Help me!
- Help me! - Help us!
Help! Help us! Help!
Help! Someone help! Someone!
Where the hell did she run off to?
What's wrong with her? What kind of nonsense is that?
translation.fr: C'est quoi, son problème ? N'importe quoi !

translation.en: Close the door.
What's going on here?
See. I'm trying to-- See...
I am a journalist. There's an emergency I need to attend to.
translation.fr: Je suis journaliste. C'est une urgence.

translation.en: Somebody's life is at stake.
This place is a military zone. Go back!
- I understand that. - I said go back.
Will you please look--
- Go back! - Just calm down now.
Try to listen to me and understand what I'm trying to say.
translation.fr: Essayez de comprendre ce que je dis.

translation.en: What...
You don't... You're not...
What the...
